name: Executioner
firstNightReminder: Wake the Executioner and point to one Townsfolk player. Add the 'Known player' token on that player.
otherNightReminder: If the Executioner's Known Player was executed the previous day, wake the Executioner and show them the 'You are now' token and a thumbs down.
ability: You learn one townsfolk player. If they are executed, you become evil.
